page.title: 15TOURISM.
page.content: Many people are attracted to this area by the excellent long and middle distance walks that are to be found here. The Pennine Way, Cockoo Walk, Colne Valley Circular Walk and Saddleworth Five Walk all pass through this area and offer varied and interesting challenges for the hiking fraternity. Game Angling is available on Butterley Reservoir and Bird Watching is popular near the other two reservoirs, Wessenden and Blakeley. Grouse shooting on the moorland is very popular and is in the hands of a Syndicate who pay the landowner for the use of the shooting rights for the season.
